name: Ninja Trek
description:
Ninja Trek is the newest RPG from Zomia Offline Games! Hearkening back to the golden 16-bit era of gaming with classic graphics and gameplay, Ninja Trek takes you to a time of turmoil in Imperial Japan. Following the Oboro clan, control one of three shinobi and brave dungeons to find an ancient artifact to save your ninja clan from destruction!

FEATURES:

--Classic 16-bit graphics!

--Classic ninja action, bringing the ninja back to gaming!

--Classic RPG controls & gameplay!

--DRM-Free!

--Choose from 3 different ninja characters!

--Multiple game endings!

--A stand-alone adventure!

--A solid RPG experience!

--This game is portable! Install once, take it anywhere!

--Licensed under the BipCot NoGov License: http://bipcot.org/

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) / 8 and 8.1 (32-bit/64-bit) / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive: 600 MB free hard disk space
  • Display Resolution: 640x480
  • Video Card: ATI/AMD or NVIDIA card with 128MB video memory
